Details.Name: Dining
Details.Feature: Enjoy exclusive offers from Visa Signature privileges, ANZ Spot and Dining privileges
Get up to 25% off at Singapore Marriott Tang Plaza Hotel, Silk Road Restaurant, Outback Steakhouse, MELT - The World Cafe and many more

Details.Name: Air Miles
Details.Feature: Complimentary travel and accident insurance coverage of up to S$1 million
Unlimited complimentary access to Airport Lounges around the world
$1 = 2.8 air miles for spend in Australia and New Zealand or on flights with Qantas and Jetstar

Details.Name: Petrol
Details.Feature: Up to 17.0% savings on S$500 ANZ StarCash prepaid card for refuel at Caltex service station
Up to 12.7% savings at Caltex ($3 off every $50 gross petrol spend (Valid till 30 Sep 2016) + 5% site discount + Caltex Thanks! points + ANZ Travel$)

Details.Name: Card Information
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver1 year fee waiver for both Principal and Supplementary cards
